typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer,
		indicator as string,
		weekly_count as integer,
		year_week as string,
		rate_14_day as double,
		cumulative_count as integer,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['ecdc/cases_deaths.csv']) ~> casesdeaths
casesdeaths filter(continent=="Europe") ~> FilterEuropeData
FilterEuropeData select(mapColumn(
		indicator,
		country,
		country_code_3_dig = country_code,
		population,
		weekly_count,
		year_week,
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Selectrequiredcolumns
Selectrequiredcolumns pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code_3_dig,
		population,
		year_week,
		source),
	pivotBy(indicator, ['cases', 'deaths']),
	count = sum(weekly_count),
	columnNaming: '$V_$N',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string
	),
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
